https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lJq2mePPr2eBl5zWz9oCJMrK3kb.jpg Taxi driver Jorge begins his night shift bent on revenge after his brother's murder at the hands of a violent gang. But when an accident brings him unexpectedly closer to his party-girl fare Angela, the damaged pair must struggle against forces already set in motion, drawing them inexorably into the rain soaked underworld of Bogota Blood and Rain
